title: GIFT City plans maiden ultra-luxury hotel in domestic tariff area, invites bids
description: The development tracks the Gujarat governmentâ€™s recent decision to exempt GIFT City from a 63-year-old liquor prohibition law in the state to attract foreign companies to invest in the city. GIFT City currently has a hotel and a club designated in the five-star segment. However, the proposed development will be the first to cater to the ultra-luxury segment.
